title: Solar Panel Maintenance Guide
content:
Solar Panel Maintenance Guide

Regular maintenance is key to keeping your solar panels operating at peak efficiency.

Cleaning Schedule

  • Clean panels every 3-6 months
  • More frequent cleaning in dusty areas
  • Professional cleaning recommended

Performance Monitoring

  • Check daily production numbers
  • Compare monthly performance
  • Report significant drops in production

Weather Considerations

  • Inspect after storms
  • Clear snow accumulation
  • Check for debris

title: Understanding Solar Tax Credits
content:
Solar Investment Tax Credit Guide

Federal Tax Credit

  • 30% of total system cost
  • Valid through 2032
  • Includes installation costs

State Incentives

  • Varies by location
  • May include rebates
  • Property tax exemptions

Documentation Needed

  • Original purchase agreement
  • Installation receipts
  • Certification documents

title: Troubleshooting Common Issues
content:
Common Solar System Issues and Solutions

Low Energy Production

  1. Check for shading
  2. Clean dirty panels
  3. Monitor inverter status

System Monitoring

  • App connection issues
  • WiFi troubleshooting
  • Data reporting delays

Weather Impact

  • Cloudy day performance
  • Storm damage assessment
  • Temperature effects

title: Battery Backup Systems
content:
Home Battery Storage Solutions

Benefits

  • Backup power during outages
  • Store excess solar production
  • Reduce grid dependency

System Types

  • Lithium-ion batteries
  • Lead-acid batteries
  • Hybrid systems

Installation

  • Space requirements
  • Integration with existing solar
  • Permit requirements
